author: mariohavel
content: Hey, as you can see the current list doesn't include open problems, all have been completed or are being worked on. There might be some new ones coming before the cohort starts. Meanwhile you can catch up on the current research and explore new problems, anything core protocol related can be worked on within EPF

author: mariohavel
content: In June, exact date will be announced when the cohort is ready. We are still in the process
